<!--
### Data
-->

```{r, data, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
## 2/26 출석부와 데이터 로딩
load("./red_and_black_190226_data.RData")
## 출석 데이터 오브젝트 날짜 명기
class_roll0226 <- class_roll
## mark 컬럼 제외
class_roll0226 <- class_roll0226[, -8]
## 수강생 수 확인
nrow(class_roll0226)
## 3/1 출석부 읽어들이기
class_roll <- read.xlsx("../data/class_roll190301.xlsx", 
                        sheetIndex = 1, 
                        startRow = 2, 
                        endRow = 172, 
                        colIndex = c(3:7, 9), 
                        colClasses = rep("character", 6), 
                        encoding = "UTF-8",
                        stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
## 3/1 수강생 수
nrow(class_roll)
## email, cell_no 명칭에 유의
names(class_roll) <- c("dept", "id", "name", "year", "email", "cell_no")
## 출석부 날짜 표시 변수 추가
class_roll0226$mark1 <- "0226"
class_roll$mark2 <- "0301"
## 학번을 키 변수로 하여 병합
class_roll.merged <- merge(class_roll, class_roll0226, 
                                by = "id", 
                                all = TRUE)
```


### 2월 26일자 출석부와 3월 1일자 출석부 통합 결과

`group`, `mark1`이 NA인 사람은 새로 들어온 사람이고, `mark2`가 NA인 사람은 나간 것임.

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "markup"}
nrow(class_roll.merged)
pander(class_roll.merged[, c("group", "mark1", "mark2")])
```

### 2월 26일자 출석부에만 나오는 사람들의 분포

```{r, echo = FALSE}
class_roll.out <- class_roll.merged[is.na(class_roll.merged$mark2), ]
pander(class_roll.out[, c("group", "mark1", "mark2")])
pander(table(class_roll.out$group))
# pander(class_roll.merged[is.na(class_roll.merged$mark2), 
#                          c("group", "mark1", "mark2")])
# pander(table(class_roll.merged[is.na(class_roll.merged$mark2), ]$group))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
id0226 <- class_roll0226$id
id0301 <- class_roll$id
stay0301 <- intersect(id0226, id0301)
length(stay0301)
new_id <- setdiff(id0301, id0226)
class_roll.stay <- subset(class_roll0226, id %in% stay0301)
class_roll.new <- subset(class_roll, id %in% new_id)
str(class_roll.stay)
str(class_roll.out)
str(class_roll.new)
str(class_roll)
```

### 새로 들어온 사람에게만 랜덤화 적용

```{r, sub randomization, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
set.seed(6)
N <- nrow(class_roll.new) 
N_red <- table(class_roll.out$group)[1]
id_red <- sample(1:N, size = 4)
# id_red <- sample(1:N, size = 7)
id_black <- setdiff(1:N, id_red)
class_roll.new$group <- ifelse(1:N %in% id_red, "Red", "Black")
class_roll.new$group <- factor(class_roll.new$group, 
                           levels = c("Red", "Black"))
# class_roll.new$group <- factor(class_roll.new$group, 
#                            labels = c("Red", "Black"))
class_roll.new <- class_roll.new[, c(1:6, 8, 7)]
names(class_roll.stay)[8] <- "mark"
names(class_roll.new)[8] <- "mark"
# red.id <- which(class_roll.new$group == "Red")
# black.id <- which(class_roll.new$group == "Black")
class_roll <- rbind(class_roll.stay, class_roll.new)
```

### 학번

```{r, id, echo = FALSE}
class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id %>% substr(1, 4)) %>%
  pander
class_roll %$%
  substr(.$id, 1, 4) %>%
  `>=`(2019) %>%
  ifelse("younger_19", "older_19") %>%
  factor(levels = c("younger_19", "older_19")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```

### 19학번 기준

```{r, echo = FALSE}
class_roll$id %>%
  substr(1, 4) %>%
  `>=`(2019) %>%
  ifelse("younger_19", "older_19") %>%
  factor(levels = c("younger_19", "older_19"),
         labels = c("19학번", "18학번 이전")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```

### 학번 홀짝

```{r, odd or even, echo = FALSE}
class_roll$id %>%
  as.numeric %>%
  `%%`(2) %>%
  factor(levels = c(1, 0), labels = c("홀", "짝")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```

### e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail, echo = FALSE}
class_roll$email %>%
  strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
  sapply("[", 2) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```

### 전화번호의 분포

```{r, echo = FALSE}
cell_numbers <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 10, stop = 13) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric)
cut_label <- paste(paste0(0:9, "000"), paste0(0:9, "999"), 
                   sep = "~")
cell_numbers %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
#   t %>%
  kable
cell_numbers %>%
  hist(main = "Histogram of Cell Phone Numbers")
cell_numbers %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table %>%
  chisq.test %>% 
  pander
```

### 성씨 분포

```{r, name, echo = FALSE}
f_name <- class_roll$name %>%
  substring(first = 1, last = 1) 
f_name %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```

### 많이 나오는 성씨

```{r, frequent names, echo = FALSE}
f_name %>%
  `%in%`(c("김", "이", "박")) %>%
  ifelse(f_name, "기타") %>%
  factor(levels = c("김", "이", "박", "기타")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) %>%
  pander
```
